entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
